title: Jimmy Martin and the The Sunny Mountain Boys 1954-1974  [5 CD]
description:
Jimmy Martin and the The Sunny Mountain Boys 1954-1974  [Bear Family 5 disc set] (1994)


The end-all, be-all compendium for fans of the King of Bluegrass, this five-CD box from Bear Family covers Jimmy Martin & the Sunny Mountain Boys' complete recordings from 1954 to 1974. All the goods are included here from his little-heard 1954 RCA sessions to his more commercial recordings for Decca/MCA in the mid '70s. With many different line-ups of his Sunny Mountain Boys--some including such luminaries as J.D. Crowe, Doyle Lawson, and Big Paul Humphries--the box reveals Martin's ultimate performative gift: his ability to pull in choice material from across genre boundaries and make it all sound like good ol' country music. From the trucker ballad "Widow Maker" to the classic hit "20/20 Vision" and from Hank Williams' covers to "You Are My Sunshine," Martin and the Sunny Mountain Boys could make any song a rollicking bluegrass number and subsequently represented the vanguard of the genre's second generation
